[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta/src/block.rs] [Integration: get_block_index_from_request] [Hash parsing vulnerability] When get_block_index_from_request() parses BlockHash at line 45-46, can malformed hash strings cause integer parsing errors or exploit the chain_id-height format? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta/src/block.rs] [Integration: get_timestamp] [Timestamp boundary] Does get_timestamp() at line 85 properly handle timestamp_usecs near u64::MAX to prevent division overflow when converting to milliseconds? (Low)
